site.title: Erick Chan - Professional Developer

hero.title: I build digital products that actually work
hero.subtitle: I develop custom systems, platforms, and digital products for businesses that want to scale, automate, and sell better.
hero.tagline: From idea to real product, no fluff

about.subtitle: What I do
about.title: Transforming Ideas into Digital Reality with Innovative Technology
about.description: I help companies, startups, and entrepreneurs design, build, and scale digital products by combining development, user experience, and automation. I work on everything from landing pages and e-commerce to complete platforms, mobile apps, and internal systems for operations, sales, and logistics.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I've collaborated on projects delivered for companies and teams working with brands like Nestlé, Uber, Elektra, and the banking sector through technology consultancies. I've also built products from scratch, leading both the technical and functional aspects.
experience.disclaimer: Logos shown represent collaborations through consulting projects.

aboutPage.title: About me
aboutPage.subtitle: Who I am and what I do
aboutPage.bio: I'm Erick Chan, a software developer with experience in web, mobile, e-commerce, and AI automation. I've worked with companies and startups helping them design, build, and scale digital products.
